Class CryptoContext.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.subhamtyagi.encryption.CryptoContext.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CryptoContext

    public static class CryptoContext.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to build an CryptoContext.

        public CryptoContext.Builder setAlgorithm(CryptoContext.Algorithm algorithm)

      • setIvLength

        public CryptoContext.Builder setIvLength(int ivLength)
        Sets the initialization vector. Defaults to 16 See IvParameterSpec or GCMParameterSpec
        Parameters:
        ivLength - the length of the initialization vector
        Returns:
        CryptoContext.Builder

      • setGcmTagLength

        public CryptoContext.Builder setGcmTagLength(CryptoContext.GcmTagLength gcmTagLength)
        Sets the GCM tag length. Defaults to 128
        Parameters:
        gcmTagLength - the tag length used for GCM modes of operation
        Returns:
        CryptoContext.Builder

      • setIterations

        public CryptoContext.Builder setIterations(int iterations)
        Sets the iterations for the Pbkdf algorithm. Defaults to 10000
        Parameters:
        iterations - the iterations used with the Pbkdf algorithm
        Returns:
        CryptoContext.Builder
